ygData.subject: Re: Range Weapon
ygData.msgSnippet: Wait until you hit level 12. Brusco s Boastful Bellow is a VERY nice ranged weapon! Lulen Bard of the 13th Chorus Solusek Ro ... From: Su-chan
ygData.messageBody:
Wait until you hit level 12. Brusco's Boastful Bellow is a VERY nice ranged
weapon!

Lulen
Bard of the 13th Chorus
Solusek Ro

----- Original Message -----
From: Su-chan <chuguet@...>
To: <eqbards@onelist.com>
Sent: Tuesday, July 06, 1999 09:46
Subject: [eqbards] Range Weapon


> From: "Su-chan" <chuguet@...>
>
> Hello bards :)
>
> I would like to get a good range weapon, but I don't know which or where
> find it. It is very annoying when de mob runs away when nit is close to
> death.
>
> I'm a level 7 , human bard of Freeport.
>
> And there is any difference between a drum or a battle drum? Or between a
> lute or a mandoline (or whatever is the other string instrument in the
bard
> guild)
>
> Thanks a lot
>
> Daryoon
> Level 7 Bard
> Erollisi Marr
